channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News

item.title: Monero’s former maintainer arrested in the US for allegations unrelated to cryptocurrency
item.dc:creator: Sam Bourgi
item.description: An arrest warrant for Riccardo Spagni was issued on July 20, 2021, at the request of the South African government. He was apprehended the same day in the United...

item.title: There’s no reason not to hold Bitcoin for 100 years, Michael Saylor says
item.dc:creator: Marie Huillet
item.description: Nobody is in a hurry with Bitcoin, according to MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor: “We’re thinking that it’s the future of the property.”

item.title: South Korean regulator to reportedly shut down 11 crypto exchanges
item.dc:creator: Helen Partz
item.description: Sources claim that several mid-sized crypto exchanges in South Korea will be unable to get approval from the FSC.

item.title: Square to acquire Australian fintech Afterpay in $29B deal
item.dc:creator: Helen Partz
item.description: Square will acquire Australian fintech firm Afterpay in a $29-billion stock deal, expecting to close the transaction in Q1 2022.

item.title: Betting on tax bill FUD: 5 things to watch in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: William Suberg
item.description: Fresh hurdles to overcome for Bitcoin sentiment come as fundamentals stay solid and $40,000 refuses to go without a fight.
